text: UNDO VS. REDO Undo: The process of removing the effects of an incomplete or aborted txn. Redo: The process of re-instating the effects of a committed txn for durability. How the DBMS supports this functionality depends on how it manages the buffer pool... e IM D P| o) 1458/1:1518 - UNDO VS.
